Name: Make-up Consultation
Details: Individual consultation for basic or special event makeup application.
Prep instructions: All skin should be clean and free of any make-up

Name: Full Makeover
Details: This service includes colors of your choice, including foundation
Prep instructions: All skin should be clean and free of any make-up

Name: Eyes and Lips
Details: This service includes a lip mask exfoliating the skin

Name: Prom Makeup
Details: This service is based on consultation, including full face

Name: Wedding Makeup
Details: This is based on consultation only - time duration will be determined upon consult
Prep instructions: All parties should have skin free of any oils and make-up

Name: Bridal Trial
Details: This service is provided before making a final booking for services, and matching the perfect colors for your special day
